Member Function Documentation

F3_MailformPlusPlus_Interceptor_ParseValues::getFloat ( $  value  )  [protected]

Parses the formated value as float. Needed for values like: x xxx,- / xx,xx / xx'xxx,xx / -xx.xxx,xx Caution: This pareses x.xxx.xxx to xxxxxxx (but xx.xx to xx.xx)

Returns:
float
Parameters:
string $value formated float
